org.springframework.orm.hibernate
Class SessionHolder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.springframework.util.ExpiringObject
        |
        +--org.springframework.orm.hibernate.SessionHolder
public class SessionHolder
extends ExpiringObject

Session holder, wrapping a Hibernate Session and a Hibernate Transaction. Features rollback-only support for nested Hibernate transactions.

HibernateTransactionManager binds instances of this class to the thread, for a given SessionFactory.

Note: This is an SPI class, not intended to be used by applications.

Since:
06.05.2003
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
HibernateTransactionManager, HibernateTransactionObject, SessionFactoryUtils
